T205 Sale --- HOF

Free s/h.  Any form of payment accepted.

Although PMs will be read and responded to, I very much prefer email at:  [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

You can also email me for better scans, offers, questions, comments, suggestions, etc.

***** Please Note:  I work evenings/nights, and keep somewhat odd hours.  Therefore response time may vary depending when I am on the computer.  However, all correspondences will be addressed.

 
Thanks for LQQKing ;), Scott
